casebody.data:
STATE
v.
BOHLER. No. COA07-1331. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed June 3, 2008. Certification Date June 23, 2008. Appeal from Moore (06CRS51158, 06CRS51159, 06CRS51160, 06CRS51161, 07CRS53).

Case Reported Without Published Opinion. No error in part, vacated and remanded in part.
